comments.author: brian@briansmith.org
comments.text: draft-saintandre-tls-server-id-check will be a BCP for matching domain names in certificates to the hostname that is being connected to. It is in second last call at the IETF. We should review the spec and provide any feedback on deal-breaking problems before the final RFC is published. Then we should implement it.
